# ProgressKind

**Structure**

An object that represents the kind of progress.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ProgressKind
```

## Discussion

When tracking file operations with the progress [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/kind] set to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressKind/file], provide a value for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileOperationKindKey] in the user info dictionary.

To specify the kind of file operation, provide one of the following values:

- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/copying]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/decompressingAfterDownloading]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/downloading]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/uploading]
- [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/FileOperationKind-swift.struct/receiving]

## Creating Kinds of Progress

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new kind of progress using the specified string.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new kind of progress using the raw value of a string you specify.

## Recognizing Kinds of Progress

- **file**: The value that indicates that the progress is tracking a file operation.

## Inspecting Progress Information

- **kind**: An object that represents the kind of progress for the progress object.
- **estimatedTimeRemaining**: A value that indicates the estimated amount of time remaining to complete the progress.
- **throughput**: A value that represents the speed of data processing, in bytes per second.
- **setUserInfoObject(_:forKey:)**: Sets a value in the user info dictionary.
- **userInfo**: A dictionary of arbitrary values for the receiver.
- **ProgressUserInfoKey**: Keys for the user info dictionary that affect the autogenerated localized additional description string.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
